mapper.update: update out_information set out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, back_time = #{backTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vehicle = #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_area = #{outArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where out_id = #{outId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select out_id, out_time, back_time, vehicle, out_area, report_id from out_information
